code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RecoverPage(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[mensagem,setMensagem]=useState('');const[carregando,setCarregando]=useState(false);const verificarEmail=async()=>{setCarregando(true);setMensagem('');try{const resposta=await fetch('http://localhost:8080/recover_senha',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email})});const dados=await resposta.json();if(dados.existe){setMensagem('✅ Email encontrado no sistema!');}else{setMensagem('❌ Email não encontrado.');}}catch(error){setMensagem('Erro ao verificar email.');}setCarregando(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:styles.container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Verificar Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Digite o email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),style:styles.input}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:verificarEmail,style:styles.button,disabled:carregando,children:carregando?'Verificando...':'Verificar'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:mensagem})]});}const styles={container:{maxWidth:400,margin:'50px auto',padding:20,border:'1px solid #ddd',borderRadius:10,textAlign:'center',fontFamily:'Arial'},input:{width:'100%',padding:10,fontSize:16,marginBottom:10,borderRadius:5,border:'1px solid #ccc'},button:{padding:'10px 20px',fontSize:16,borderRadius:5,backgroundColor:'#007bff',color:'white',border:'none',cursor:'pointer'}};export default RecoverPage;
